cast.overview: An expansive Russian drama, this film focuses on the life of revered religious icon painter Andrei Rublev. Drifting from place to place in a tumultuous era, the peace-seeking monk eventually gains a reputation for his art. But after Rublev witnesses a brutal battle and unintentionally becomes involved, he takes a vow of silence and spends time away from his work. As he begins to ease his troubled soul, he takes steps towards becoming a painter once again.
cast.title: Andrei Rublev

details.biography: Nelli Snegina was born on January 28, 1938. She was an actress, known for Andrei Rublev (1966), Vremya, vperyod! (1965) and Gnev (1974). She died in 2008.
details.name: Nelli Snegina
